                  Weapon weapon)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Main method of the class, calls all the method needed to shoot people
        Parameters:
        player - The player who wants to shoot
        weapon - The weapon the player is using
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - In case something goes wrong with the connection

                           Weapon weapon)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Makes the user select the attack it wants to use
        Parameters:
        player - The player acting
        weapon - The weapon he is using
        Returns:
        The selected attack if there are some, null if no attacks can be done
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - In case something goes wrong with the connection
